page.Resource: "{0}" is not a valid IP section value (must be less then 255).
"{0}" is not a valid IP section value.

page.name: ADMIN_BBCODE_EDIT
page.Resource: Required Description of this extension to the user.
Required Simple name of this extension.
CSS to help display this extension. Just enter CSS into this field. style tag will be added automatically.
JS code used to help with the extension display. Just enter javascript into this field. script tag will be added automatically.

JS code used to modify the text editor. Use "{{editorid}}" (without quotes) to have the text editor ID replaced in the code. Just enter javascript into this field. script tag will be added automatically.
Required Number representing in which order the extensions are executed. Lowest executed first.
You must enter an number value from 0 to 32767 for sort order.
The sort order value should be a positive integer from 0 to 32767.
JS code called when this BBCode extension is clicked client-side. Just enter javascript into this field. script tags will be added automatically.
Required Regular expression for replacement of the search BBCode.
Optional field. Separate variables with semi-colon; no other punctuation or spaces allowed.
Required Regular expression to find this BBCode. BBCode is always surrounded with []. This expression system is not designed for plain text searching (use the word replace for that).
Use server-side module (class) instead of replace regex?

page.name: ADMIN_GROUPS
page.Resource: Note: Deleting a role here removes it completely from the provider. "Add to YAF" to make this role accessible in the forum.
Note: Deleting one of these "linked" roles outside of YAF will cause user data loss. If you want to delete the role, first "Delete from YAF" then the role can be managed outside of YAF.

page.name: ADMIN_HOSTSETTINGS
page.Resource: Automatically abandon sessions for users who are marked as "Don't Track" such as Search Engines and Bots. Enable if you're having any session issues.
Comma seperated list (no spaces) of HTML tags that are allowed in posts headers for common users editors.
Comma seperated list (no spaces) of HTML tags that are allowed in posts using HTML editors.
Number of minutes to display users in Active Users list.
Restrict display of active topics feeds.
Number of albums to show per page.
Allow Poll Changes After First Vote:
If enabled a poll creator can change choices and question after the first vote was given.
If checked, the user gender is displayed in the user data in messages list.
Allow users to change their email address.
If checked, users will be allowed to email topics.
If checked forums with duplicated names can be created.
Automatically use users Gavatars if they exist (note: may require additional processing).
If enabled Guests can see poll choices.
If enabled a poll creator can hide results before voting end or if not all polls in a group are voted.
Allow to view IPs to moderators.
If checked, and "Enable Display Name" checked, allow modification of Display Name in Edit Profile.
If enabled users can create poll questions allowing multiple choices voting.
Allow Notification of All Posts on All topics:
Allow users to get individual email notifications on all emails -- tons of email traffic.
Allow users to change their passwords.
Allow users email notifications when new private messages arrive.
Allow users to access and send private messages. You should explicitly give permission for each group and/or rank too to enable them for users.
If checked, post to blog feature is enabled.
Enable or disable display of the Quick Reply Box at the bottom of the Posts page
Allow users to send emails to each other.
Allow users to create signatures. You should set allowed number of characters and BBCodes for each group and/or rank to really enable the feature.
If checked users can thank posts they consider useful.
Duplicate topic names are allowed to:
If checked, the user who checked it will not be visible in the active users list.
If enabled Users can add images as poll options.
Maximum size for avatars in bytes.
Can users upload avatars to their profile.
Require users to enter the CAPTCHA when they register for the forum.
Require guest users to enter the CAPTCHA when they post or reply to a forum message (including Quick Reply).
Size (length) of the CAPTCHA random alphanumeric string.

Check to allow users to automatically be created when downloading usenet messages. Only enable this in a test environment, and NEVER in a production environment. The main purpose of this option is for performance testing.
Crop the Preview of the Image and use above Dimensions as Image Size.
Number of days until posts are locked and not possible to edit or delete. Set to 0 for no limit.
Disable "NoFollow" Tag on Links on Posts Older Than:
If "NoFollow" is enabled above, this is disable no follow for links on messages older then X days old (which takes into consideration last edited).
New users won't be able to register.
If checked, points for posting will be displayed for each user.
Maximum size of picture attachment to display as picture. Pictures over this size will be displayed as links.
If checked, description and keywords meta tags will be created dynamically on the post pages.
If unchecked users will not need to verify their email address.
If checked, album feature is enabled. You should set allowed number of images and albums for each group and/or rank too, to enable the feature.
If checked users can add each other as buddies.

Require users to enter the CAPTCHA when they post or reply to a forum message (including Quick Reply).
If checked, YAF uses an alternative "Display Name" instead of the UserName.

Restrict display of active topics feeds.
Uploaded files will be saved in the database instead of the file system.
Number of seconds before another post can be entered (Does not apply to admins or mods).

Restrict display of posts feeds for latest posts.

If login is disabled in the AppSettings (AllowLoginAndLogoff needs to be set to "false"), this is the URL users will be redirected to when they need to access the forum. Optionally add "{0}" to the URL to pass the return URL to the custom Url. E.g. "http://mydomain.com/login.aspx?PreviousUrl={{0}}"

Number of a question choices, max value no more then 99.
Number of polls, max value no more then 99.

page.name: ADMIN_MAIL
page.Resource: Are you sure you want to send this mail?

page.name: ADMIN_MEDALS
page.Resource: Medal image as it'll be displayed in user box.
Ribbon bar image as it'll be displayed in user box.

page.name: ADMIN_NNTPRETRIEVE
page.Resource:
The NNTP feature of Yet Another Forum.net is still beta, and will have bugs. Bugs you should look for is character set conversion, and incorrect time on posts. Usenet articles will be posted to the forum with the date from the article header, meaning that you well could get future dates. Please let me know of any unknown time zones that are encountered.

The forums usenet artiles are posted to should be read-only, as messages will not be posted back to the usenet. For speed purposes usenet articles are automatically approved, meaning that if the forum is moderated, the posts will be automatically approved.

To protect usenet servers, a newsgroup can only be updated once every 10 minutes.
Specify how much time article retrieval should use.

page.Resource: Are you sure you want to change your database recovery mode?\nThe operation may make the DB inaccessible and may take a little while.\nDO THIS ONLY IF YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING!

Shrink operation was Successful.Your database size is now: {0}MB
Database recovery mode was successfuly set to {0}
Something went wrong with this operation.The reported error is: {0}
Full (Full Recovery allows the database to be recovered to the point of failure.)
Simple (Simple Recovery allows the database to be recovered to the most recent backup.You need to backup your DB regularly.)
With any data modification operations, table fragmentation can occur. This command can be used to rebuild all the indexes on all the tables in database to boost performance.
Show statistical information about YAF table indexes.
You can use the Shrink method to reduce the size of the files that make up the database manually. The data is stored more densely and unused pages are removed

Vastuseks teie registreerumisele saadetakse e-kiri. Sisselogimiseks palume kontrollida sissetulevat postkasti ja vajutada e-kirjas olevale lingile.

page.name: HELP_INDEX
page.Resource:
Buddies are a friendship function and are a two-way relationship between two users. It is initiated by one user and accepted by the other.

Where is list of Buddies displayed?

Your Buddies are displayed on the 'My Buddies' you can access this page from the Header Link 'My Buddies', or from the User Control Panel Link 'Edit Buddies'.

Note: If you don't See this Link you don't have any Buddies, didn't send any Request or you didn't have any Pending Buddy Requests.

Your buddies are also displayed in your profile page.

How can I request a User as Buddy or accept an Buddy Request?

To request a user as Buddy, view the profile page of the person you want to become friends with and click the 'Add as Buddy' link.

To accept an Buddy request friend, go to your 'My Buddies' page. On the Tab 'Pending Requests' you see The List of Users with pending requests. There you have three choices...

  • Approve - You Become Buddy of the User who requests it
  • Deny - Reject the request
  • Approve and Add - You become Buddy of the User who requests it, and also the User becomes a Body in your List.

Remove Buddy

To remove a Buddy from Your List go to your 'My Buddies' page. On the Tab 'Buddy List' Click on the Button 'Remove Buddy' of the User you want to remove

Your Requests

The Third Tab of the 'My Buddies' Page shows your the Pending Request you have made.

You can change your account information using Personal Profile -> 'Edit Profile' option from within the User Control Panel. If you want to change your Password there is an extra Page (Change Password) for that in the User Control Panel, where you can set a new Password.

Edit Profile Page

This page allows you to set a number of required and optional details, some of which will be displayed on your public profile. With the exception of your e-mail address, do not enter information that you do not wish to be publicly viewable.

About You

These are the Basic Information about you

Location

Here you can optionally enter the Place where you live

Home Page

Here you can optionally enter a Home page and/or a Blog.

Instant messaging services

Here you can optionally enter your messenger Ids of services such as MSN, YAHOO, AIM, ICQ, XMPP, SKYPE.

Time Zone

Here you can specify the Time Zone to adjust the board Time and Date to your local time. And set the Daylight Saving Time should it be automatically adjusted.

Forum Settings

Here you change your Email Address.

And if the Administrator has enabled it you can change the Forum Language and the Theme of the Site.

On the 'Email Notification' Preferences Page inside your User Control Panel you can set Up, what type of Email Notifications you want to receive.

Turn off notifications - This Options turns off all Notifications and you wont receive any emails.

Notification for topics you've posted to, watched or marked as favorite - You will receive Instant Email Notifications when someone has posted a new Message in a topic, you have posted before, a topic you watch, marked as favorite, or an forum.

Notification for topics or forums you've selectively watched (listed below) - You will receive Instant Email Notifications when someone has posted a new Message in a topic or forum you have selected to watch (See List Below).

Receive once daily digest/summary of activity? - If this Function is enabled you can turn this option on to get an Email with all new Activities about new topics and messages from current day as daily digest (summary) in one mail

Receive an email notification when you get a new private message? - You can also turn on/off Email Notifications when you receive an private message.
Uue postituste või tänaste postituste vaatamine

When you have logged in and load the Page you may receive an Pop Up Notification on the center of your Browser Window.

This will inform you about serval actions...

  • New Private Message(s)
  • New Buddy Requests
  • Approved Buddy Requests
  • Denied Buddy Requests

You may also receive a couple of Information and Error Messages in the same way.

Kui oled unustanud oma salasõna, siis saad klikata "Unustatud salasõna" lingile. Link ilmub kõikidele lehtedele, kus nõutakse parooli.

Link tekitab uue akna, kuhu peaksid sisestama oma kasutajanime. E-postiga saadetakse juhendi, kuidas salasõna uuesti määrata.

Kuna paroole hoitakse krüpteeritud kujul, ei ole võimalik esialgset parooli taastada. See valik võimaldab teil uuesti määrata oma parool.

Teil peab olema võimalik e-kirju vastu võtta registreeritud e-posti aadressile, et seda võimalust kasutada. Vajadusel kontrollige rämpskirjade filtreid ja vastavaid kaustu, kui te ei ole seda e-kirja kätte saanud mõne minuti möödudes.

Subscriptions are a way to keep track of different topics and/or forums. You can choose how you are notified about updates - for example by having them listed in your User Control Panel and receiving e-mail updates for each one.

Or if you don't want to manually subscribe to an topic you want to follow you can turn on the Option 'Notification for topics you've posted to, watched or marked as favorite' in the E-mail Notification Preferences Page inside the User CP.

How to watch a topic?

To subscribe to a topic, click the 'Options' link at the top of the list of posts then click 'Watch this topic'.

How to watch a forum?

To subscribe to a forum, click on the 'Watch Forum' link bellow the list of topics.

How do I manage my Subscriptions of Watched topics and forums?

You can see the List of 'Watched Forums' and 'Watched Topics' from the 'Email Notification Preferences' Page of your User Controp Panel. There you can select which subscriptions you wish to delete by Clicking on the Unwatch button.

The 'Thanks' - System is a function that allows you to gave back an other user a positive feedback, for example he or she has posted a message you find useful or helps you to solve a problem.

How to gave a User a Thanks?

If you want to gave an User an 'Thank' press the 'Thank' Button inside the Post you want to add it, after that you find your Name in the List of User who gave a Thank at the end of the Message. You can also remove your Thank at any time.

View all Thanks

If you want to view all Posts you gave Thank, or show the list of posts you received thanks got to the page Personal Profile -> 'View Thanks' from within the User Control Panel. There you see Two Tabs...

  • Your Name thanked - Shows the List of Messages where you gave a thank.
  • Your Name was thanked - Shows the List your Messages where you received thanks.
Siin leiate vastused foorumi tööga seotud küsimustele. Kasutage vasakul olevaid linke või all olevat otsingut, et leida vastuseid.

page.name: RULES
page.Resource: Ei nõustu käesolevate reeglite ja poliitikaga

[size=5]Selle foorumi haldajatel ei ole võimalik kontrollida iga postituse õigsust. Postitused kajastavad autori vaateid ja arvamusi, mis ei pruugi vastata foorumi haldajate vaadetele ja arvamustele. Kui teile tundub, et mõni postitus ei ole kohane, palume koheselt teavitada foorumi administraatorit.
Te kohustute mitte postitada ebaviisakaid, vaenu õhutavaid või ähvardavaid postitusi, samuti postitusi, mis rikuvad muul viisil kehtivaid seadusi. Selle kohustuse mittetäitmisel võidakse teie kasutajakonto blokeerida. Kõik IP-aadressid logitakse ja kasutatakse kasutaja postituste kontrollimisel
Käesolevaga nõustute, et foorumi haldajatel on õigus kustutada, toimetada, liigutada või sulgeda mis tahes teemasid, mis tahes ajal. Kasutajana nõustute mis tahes teie poolt sisestatud informatsiooni salvestamisega andmebaasi. Kuna seda informatsiooni ei avaldata kolmandatele isikutele ilma teie nõusolekuta, siis käesoleva foorumi haldajad ei vastuta mis tahes lahtimurdmise katsete eest, mille tõttu võivad tekkida andmelekked.
Sellel foorumil kasutatakse küpsiseid andmete salvestamiseks teie arvutisse. Nad ei sisalda teie poolt sisestatud informatsiooni, vaid parameetreid, mis on vajalikud foorumi töö tõhustamiseks. Sisestatud e-posti aadressi kasutatakse ainult teie registreeringu ja parooli kinnitamiseks (samuti uute paroolide saatmiseks, kui olete kehtiva parooli unustanud).
Te kohustute mitte kasutama automatiseeritud vahendeid foorumis registreerimiseks või postitamiseks.[/size]
[center][size=6][b]Vajutades allolevale "Nõustun..." nupule, kohustute järgima käesoleva foorumi reegleid.[/b][/size][/center]
